mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note (title, content, creationDate, deleted, idNotebook, idPriority, idUser) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{creationDate}, (0), #{idNotebook}, #{idPriority}, #{idUser})
mapper.select: SELECT idNote, title, content, creationDate, idNotebook, idPriority, idUser FROM note WHERE deleted = (0) AND idNotebook = #{idNotebook}

SELECT idNote, title, content, creationDate, idNotebook, idPriority, idUser FROM note WHERE deleted = (0) AND ( #{idNotebook} IS NULL OR idNotebook = #{idNotebook}) AND ( #{idPriority} IS NULL OR idPriority = #{idPriority}) AND idUser= #{idUser}
mapper.update: UPDATE note SET deleted = (1) WHERE idNote = #{idNote}
UPDATE note SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, deleted = IFNULL(#{deleted}, deleted), idNotebook = #{idNotebook}, idPriority = #{idPriority} WHERE idNote = #{idNote}
